column4: Huh, now xml documents still open in firefox but create a gedit window titled "opening yourfile.xml" for 10 seconds before it closes.
you must edit or delete the file /.local/share/applications/mimeapps.list
Thanks, fixed it. It's handy to have everything somewhere in a plaintext file
yes, very hand file.  remember that will come in handy again, i'm sure!! :)
